title.rendered: 35% OFF Toys Ends Saturday! + Author Signing

content.rendered:
The Sale is Almost Over!

The 35% Off Melissa & Doug Sale ENDS this Saturday!

Author Signing Event: February 27

This Saturday, support your community by joining us for our author signing event.

We will feature seven local and regional authors offering a wide range of genres: fiction, sci-fi, memoir, young adult, poetry, and comic books! Copies of their works will be available.

Ladies’ Night Out

Preschool in a Package

Local educators Toni Smith and Jane Shepley used their 75 years of combined teaching experience to create a homeschool program for preschoolers. Designed to jumpstart children for kindergarten, Preschool in a Package features flexible curriculum, easy to follow lesson plans, and suggestions for extended activities to enhance the learning experience.

For more information, visit their website or follow them on Facebook.
